content: I'm new and trying to get up to speed. I've been reading a lot of Polonius-related materials. I just requested access to the compiler working group DropBox folder, but I don't know if there's anything in there I should read?
I don't think there's anything in there in particular -- probably the best source to get up to speed are the youtube related videos
I see there is a Polonius WG Sync Meeting today at 3pm eastern time. Would it be ok if I sat in on that meeting?
